channel.title: Cant attack in fight pits?
channel.description:
hey everyone! this is sommit i cant fix whenever the fight pits minigame is on, (playervsplayer) u cant attack the player, or any other player why is this? could u help me please? i looked for a tut, and some help, but still no results a link, or some help would be appreciated
Thank you! ~~WaleedScape~~
